name: cache
shortDescription: Configure persistent disk cache and retrieve cache statistics.
longDescription:
Angular CLI saves a number of cachable operations on disk by default. When you re-run the same build, the build system restores the state of the previous build and re-uses previously performed operations, which decreases the time taken to build and test your applications and libraries. To amend the default cache settings, add the `cli.cache` object to your [Workspace Configuration](guide/workspace-config). The object goes under `cli.cache` at the top level of the file, outside the `projects` sections. ```jsonc { "$schema": "./node_modules/@angular/cli/lib/config/schema.json", "version": 1, "cli": { "cache": { // ... } }, "projects": {} } ``` For more information, see [cache options](guide/workspace-config#cache-options). ### Cache environments By default, disk cache is only enabled for local environments. The value of environment can be one of the following: - `all` - allows disk cache on all machines. - `local` - allows disk cache only on development machines. - `ci` - allows disk cache only on continuous integration (Ci) systems. To change the environment setting to `all`, run the following command: ```bash ng config cli.cache.environment all ``` For more information, see `environment` in [cache options](guide/workspace-config#cache-options).
The Angular CLI checks for the presence and value of the `CI` environment variable to determine in which environment it is running.
### Cache path By default, `.angular/cache` is used as a base directory to store cache results. To change this path to `.cache/ng`, run the following command: ```bash ng config cli.cache.path ".cache/ng" ```

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.
options.descriptionCn: 在控制台显示关于本命令的帮助信息。

subcommands.name: clean
subcommands.shortDescription: Deletes persistent disk cache from disk.
subcommands.shortDescriptionCn: 从磁盘中删除永久性磁盘缓存。

subcommands.name: disable
subcommands.shortDescription: Disables persistent disk cache for all projects in the workspace.
subcommands.shortDescriptionCn: 为工作区中的所有项目禁用永久性磁盘缓存。

subcommands.name: enable
subcommands.shortDescription: Enables disk cache for all projects in the workspace.
subcommands.shortDescriptionCn: 为工作区中的所有项目启用磁盘缓存。

subcommands.name: info
subcommands.shortDescription: Prints persistent disk cache configuration and statistics in the console.
subcommands.shortDescriptionCn: 在控制台中打印永久性磁盘缓存配置和统计信息。

shortDescriptionCn: 配置永久性磁盘缓存并检索缓存统计信息。
longDescriptionCn:
默认情况下，Angular CLI 会在磁盘上保存许多可缓存操作。 当你重新运行同一个构建时，构建系统会恢复以前构建的状态并重用以前已执行的操作，这会减少构建和测试应用程序和库所需的时间。 要修改默认缓存设置，请将 `cli.cache` 对象添加到你的[工作区配置](guide/workspace-config)中。该对象位于文件顶层的 `cli.cache` 下，在 `projects` 部分之外。 ```jsonc { "$schema": "./node_modules/@angular/cli/lib/config/schema.json", "version": 1, "cli": { "cache": { // ... } }, "projects": {} } ``` 有关更多信息，请参阅[缓存选项](guide/workspace-config#cache-options)。 ### 缓存环境 默认情况下，仅为本地环境启用磁盘缓存。 Environment 的值可以是以下之一： - `all` - 允许在所有机器上进行磁盘缓存。 - `local` - 仅允许在开发机器上进行磁盘缓存。 - `ci` - 仅允许在持续集成 (Ci) 系统上进行磁盘缓存。 要将环境设置更改为`all` ，请运行以下命令： ```bash ng config cli.cache.environment all ``` 有关更多信息，请参阅[缓存选项](guide/workspace-config#cache-options)中的`environment` 。
Angular CLI 会检查 `CI` 环境变量的存在和值，以确定它正在哪个环境中运行。
### 缓存路径 默认情况下，`.angular/cache`被用作存储缓存结果的基础目录。 要将此路径更改为`.cache/ng` ，请运行以下命令： ```bash ng config cli.cache.path ".cache/ng" ```
